    public static enum Hibernate3Module.Feature
extends Enum<Hibernate3Module.Feature>
    Enumeration that defines all togglable features this module

      This feature determines how PersistentCollections properties for which no annotation is found are handled with respect to lazy-loading: if true, lazy-loading is only assumed if annotation is used to indicate that; if false, lazy-loading is assumed to be the default.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • FORCE_LAZY_LOADING

        public static final Hibernate3Module.Feature FORCE_LAZY_LOADING
        Whether lazy-loaded object should be forced to be loaded and then serialized (true); or serialized as nulls (false).

        Default value is false.

      • USE_TRANSIENT_ANNOTATION

        public static final Hibernate3Module.Feature USE_TRANSIENT_ANNOTATION
        Whether Transient annotation should be checked or not; if true, will consider

      • REQUIRE_EXPLICIT_LAZY_LOADING_MARKER

        public static final Hibernate3Module.Feature REQUIRE_EXPLICIT_LAZY_LOADING_MARKER
        This feature determines how PersistentCollections properties for which no annotation is found are handled with respect to lazy-loading: if true, lazy-loading is only assumed if annotation is used to indicate that; if false, lazy-loading is assumed to be the default. Note that FORCE_LAZY_LOADING has priority over this Feature; meaning that if it is defined as true, setting of this Feature has no effect.

        Default value is false, meaning that laziness is considered to be the default value.

        Since:
        2.4
